page.title: 07RESTAURANTS IN BOVINGDON
page.content:
{CHINESE TAKE_AWAY {FISH AND CHIP SHOP {TANDOORI INDIAN RESTAURANTS }
Two of the restaurants had local customers, the other one also had customers that were passing by. In the fish and chip shop five people worked, two in the chinese take away, and three in the Tandoori. All of the people working there liked working in Bovingdon. The people had been running the Tandoori Restaurant for only seven months. The people in the Chinese take away had been running it for three years, and the Fish and Chip shop for eight years.
